item.title: IdentityIQEssentialsIntroduction
item.description: Introduction Reading data: all systems from which data is read are called applications. Identity cubes created when aggregating accounts from an authoritative application (system of record), e.g., HR system or AD. Business modeling Governance Process Provisioning Process : User Request; Lifecycle event
